alert.note: Alert for Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Trego County through 100 AM CDT... At 1220 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Utica, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Trego Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for west central Kansas.
